column1: I am hiring for Java developers who can also collaborate effectively with my business teams.
Looking to hire mid-level professionals who are proficient in Python, SQL and JavaScript.
Here is a JD text, can you recommend some assessment that can help me screen applications. I am hiring for an analyst and want applications to screen using cognitive and personality tests.
Need a front-end engineer with strong JavaScript and problem-solving skills.
Hiring for data analyst roles requiring analytical and Excel proficiency.
Looking for project managers with leadership and communication skills.
Hiring for HR professionals with strong behavioral and personality fit.
Need assessments for finance graduates with logical reasoning and numerical aptitude.
Looking to hire customer service agents with empathy and communication skills.
